title: Layout Builder

fields.label: Layout Builder
fields.name: page_builder
fields.instructions: Click on the pencil to edit each row or element. Click on the + or - icons to add or remove elements and rows.

sub_fields.label: Alignment
sub_fields.name: buttons_variation
sub_fields.instructions: Select the alignment of the button(s) or link(s).

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: variation
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the Text Element is displayed. An image will only display if you have selected one above.

sub_fields.label: Details Item
sub_fields.name: details_item
sub_fields.instructions: An expandable, clickable element revealing hidden content.

sub_fields.label: Form
sub_fields.name: form
sub_fields.instructions: Select which form to use

sub_fields.label: Aspect Ratio/Size
sub_fields.name: variation
sub_fields.instructions: Choose how the image will be displayed.

choices.image--prop: Proportional (same aspect ratio as original image)

choices.text--default: No image or content overlaying a background image

sub_fields.label: Row Style
sub_fields.name: row_variation
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the width of the row.

choices.section--full-sm-col: Full-width row with small column spacing
choices.section--full-no-col: Full-width row with no column spacing

sub_fields.label: Row Background Colour
sub_fields.name: row_background_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether to display a different background colour on the row.
